system.requirements: Tier 3: Untouchable E.Adv, Warp Disruption, Willpower 55. Aptitudes: Willpower
system.effect: The Range of the Warp Disruption Talent is doubled from Willpower Bonus to 2x Willpower Bonus metres.

description.value: The Range of the Warp Disruption Talent is doubled from Willpower Bonus to 2x Willpower Bonus metres.
